description:
From the creator of:  

Monstruct! (2017 IGMC 5th Place) 
Abyss of Oblivion (2018 IGMC 5th Place)
The Dreamchaser (2020 RPG Maker MZ "You got It, Now Use It" Jam 1st & 2nd Place)

===

An entry for the Build Your Own Game Jam (The 6th Annual DG GJ)

===

Diamond Conquest, a tactical card game that has taken the world by storm in the not-so-distant future, is a favorite pastime of both the young and old. 

At present, the 14th Annual Diamond Conquest Championship Tournament is about to enter its climax, with just hours to go before the start of the quarterfinals... 

===

  • Features an original easy-to-learn, hard-to-master tactical card game.
  • Duel dozens of opponents and collect all 50 cards.
  • Discover hidden codes and unravel a story that is not what it seems.
  • Optional challenging content that unlocks an extra epilogue. 

===
